effect.text: When this Aeolus is Enchanted you can Enchant an additional 3 Wind. You can disenchant 2 Wind from this Aeolus to Search your Deck for a 1 Spirit Wind Elestral and add it to your Hand.
When this Aeromare is used to Ascend to Glydesdale, Empower this Card as an Artifact to Glydesdale with the Effect "Empowered Elestral cannot be Targeted or Destroyed by Opponent's Runes"
Add up to 3 Spirits from your Underworld to your Spirit Deck.
You can Discard this Ampup from your Hand to your Underworld and Expend 1 Thunder to Search your Deck for up to 2 Ampup and add them to your Hand.
You can Nexus up to 2 Water on your Field. If you successfully Nexus from this Effect you can Draw 2 Cards.
Every time this Astrabbit receives Thunder you can Look at the top 3 Cards of your Deck and add 1 Card to your Hand. Place the other 2 Cards back and Shuffle.
All Elestrals on the Field gain 1 Attack and 1 Defense for each of their Enchanted Water.

The Empowered Elestral gains 2 Defense and cannot be Targeted by Runes. If Aeolus is Enchanted and the Empowered Elestral Destroys an Elestral in Battle you can Target and Destroy 1 Rune on the Field.
This Blazerus can Attack twice. If this Blazerus Destroys 2 Elestrals in the same Battle Phase you can Special Ascend this Blazerus to Trifernal from your Hand or Deck during the End Phase.
You can Disenchant 1 Thunder from this Boombatt to Target and Destroy an Opponent's Enchanted Elestral.
When this Capregal Destroys an Opponent's Elestral in Battle you can Special Enchant a Foamee from your Underworld in Attack Position.
When this Carryon is Destroyed in Battle, Target the Elestral that Destroyed it and take Control of it until the End Phase.
You can Disenchant 1 Earth from Centaurbor to Target and Destroy 1 Card on the Field. If Foloi Forest is Enchanted this Centaurbor cannot be Targeted by Invoke Runes
You can Nexus up to 2 Spirits on your Field. If you successfully Nexus from this Effect you can Draw 1 Card.
